var Base = require("./base");
 
/**
 */
 
module.exports = Base.extend({
 
  /**
   */
 
  update: function() {
    if (!this.value) return;
    Eif (this.node.focus) {
      var self = this;
 
      Eif (!process.browser) return this.node.focus();
 
      // focus after being on screen. Need to break out
      // of animation, so setTimeout is the best option
      setTimeout(function() {
        self.node.focus();
      }, 1);
    }
  }
});
